src:
U.N. climate office confirms that December's global climate meeting will take place in Madrid, ...
01 Nov 2019, 14:59 by EndPlay
BERLIN - BERLIN (AP) - U.N. climate office confirms that December's global climate meeting will take place in Madrid, after Chile cancellation.
